summary: Its fix the layout inside the College of Winterhold, adding destroyed building's and rubble outside the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
Don't forget to endorse it keeps me motivated to continue working on this mod
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

This is something i Stared last year to fix the layout inside the College of Winterhold, now i thought to add destroyed building's and rubble around Winterhold to make it more of a Collapse city.

If anyone whats to make this mod better just text my and let me now

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------FEATURES----------

Changes the College of Winterhold Doors to make more sense, adding destroyed building's and rubble outside the College of Winterhold.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
---------- REQUIREMENT----------
Skyrim 1.8
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------COMPATIBILITY----------

Dawnguard
Hearthfire
Dragonborn
Tales of Lycanthropy
Frostfall
WetandCold
WATER
WATER Dragonborn Waves
Auto Unequip Ammo
Winter is coming
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------THINGS I WILL THINK ABOUT LATER----------

Add house with interior
More about the Great Collapse
Book about one of two of the people that lived there
Statues to ? some were around Winterhold
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------UPDATE 1.1C - WORK IN PROGRESS----------

Finishing the wall Ruin (DONE) may add more rubble
Finish Adding a skeleton of a ? (DONE)
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
----------UPDATE 1.1B - OUT NOW----------
